text: The Arrondissement of Bayeux is an arrondissement of France. It is in the Calvados département, in the Normandy region. It has 6 cantons and 126 communes. ==Cantons== The cantons of the arrondissement of Bayeux are: # Balleroy # Bayeux # Caumont-l'Éventé # Isigny-sur-Mer # Ryes # Trévières ==Communes== The communes of the arrondissement of Bayeux, and their INSEE codes, are: 1\. Agy (14003) 2\. Aignerville (14004) 3\. Anctoville (14011) 4\. Arganchy (14019) 5\. Arromanches-les-Bains (14021) 6\. Asnelles (14022) 7\. Asnières-en-Bessin (14023) 8\. Balleroy (14035) 9\.
